ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Animals Expanded - Patch Pack
ModMetaData.author: Andross
ModMetaData.description: Patch pack for Vanilla Animals Expanded that includes patches for A Dog Said and Combat Extended for the current releases of Vanilla Animals Expanded. Changelog: 04 / Sep / 19 - Fixed cross reference error with A Dog Said 02 / Sep / 19 - Desert & Extreme Desert Update 16 / Aug / 19 - Arid Shrubland Update 03 / Aug / 19 - Initial Release Credits: Oskar Potocki - Vanilla Animals Expanded Animal Collab Proj - Used some of their numbers
